content: NCT 85-A Cu/Al cable cutter Cordless pistol-grip copper and aluminum cable cutter with high cutting capacity up to 3.3 / 85 mm diameter ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Pipe press tools, cutters, and crimpers ### FEATURES:Features High cutting performance up to 3.3 for copper and aluminum conductors High cutting performance up to 85 mm outer diameter for aluminum and copper cables Long-lasting copper and aluminum cutting blades Scissor-style blades to easily fit around large-size cables Cutting blades retract automatically when the cutting operation is complete Applications Cutting large-size copper and aluminum cables up to 3.3 Cutting large-size copper and aluminum cables up to 85 mm Cutting underground cables made of copper and aluminum Cutting multi- and fine-stranded cables ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS
